title: KXORW/KXORB/KXORQ/KXORD â€” Bitwise Logical XOR Masks

fields.name: Instruction Modes
fields.value:
`KXORW k1, k2, k3`
`KXORB k1, k2, k3`
`KXORQ k1, k2, k3`
`KXORD k1, k2, k3`

fields.name: Description
fields.value: Performs a bitwise XOR between the vector mask k2 and the vector mask k3, and writes the result into vector mask k1 (three-operand form).

footer.text: Thanks to Felix Cloutier for the online x86 reference
